text:
Monroe/Dearborn, MI - Full time

MNX Solutions (http://www.mnxsolutions.com) is based in Monroe MI and provides managed services and consulting for Linux and SAP based systems.

2 x SAP basis experts to provide onsite support in Dearborn MI. Knowledge of SAP ECC / SAP XI and 5+ years of experience required.

Linux server administrator - Complete detail available at http://www.mnxsolutions.com/jobs

Send an email to hr@mnxsolutions.com with your details!
